childish gambino: at this point the boys perception of time slows down immensely  d2: frantically who did you call  the boy looks at dude 2 not at him though.  he can see inside of him.  he sees his soul all of his fear and confusion swirling around violently inside of him  tb: nonchalantly youve had my phone  d2: it must be other dealers who did you piss off  the boy stops looking through dude 2 and feels something he cant describe;
